document.docAuthor: Cheng, Zhi-Fei, Li, Li-Zhen & Peng, Zhong
document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from China

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Lesteva ( s. str. ) submaculata
Rougemont, 2000 : 160
;
Shavrin, 2013 : 95
, 2014: 295.
Type locality.
Mt. Longwang, Anji County, Zhejiang Province , China .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Comment. The previously known distribution of
L. submaculata
included Zhejiang and Jiangxi provinces ( Rougemont 2000 ; Shavrin 2013 , 2014 ). The above material from Anhui and Hubei represent new provincial records ( Fig. 32 ). For illustrations of
L. submaculata
see Figs 21B , 22 C–D, 23D–F and Rougemont (2000 : figs 5, 23a–c).
